resource.string:
Usage:
{}$ {} [log=0|1] [localized=0|1] [pin=0|1] [adm=0|1] [autoexec=0|1] [admhex=0|1]
Example: - config log: Yes localized: Yes pin: Yes adm: Yes autoexec: Yes admhex: Yes
- config log=0 autoexec=0 log: No localized: Yes pin: Yes adm: Yes autoexec: No admhex: Yes
options: - log: Store the debug info into 'logs' folder - localized: Use the localized language (if supported) - pin: Auto store the pin code if verified pass - adm: Auto store the adm code if verified pass - autoexec: Autoexec plugins(when 'is_auto_exec' as TRUE) during startup stage - admhex: Input format of ADM key, TRUE is hex mode, else is digit
